localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Global.health is a collaborative effort by technologists and researchers from leading international institutions to build a trusted, detailed, and accurate resource of real-time infectious disease data.
blogPost.body: Global.health is a collaborative effort by technologists and researchers from leading international institutions to build a trusted, detailed, and accurate resource of real-time infectious disease data.
blogPost.title: Global.health - Access data about 5M+ anonymized COVID-19 cases
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Global.health是来自主要国际机构的技术专家和研究人员的合作努力，旨在建立一个值得信赖、详细、准确的实时传染病数据资源。
localize.tagline: 获取500万+匿名的COVID-19案例的数据

localize.description: Global.health是來自主要國際機構的技術專家和研究人員的合作努力，旨在建立一個值得信賴、詳細、準確的實時傳染病數據資源。
localize.tagline: 獲取500萬+匿名的COVID-19案例的數據

previous.excerpt: Ever wondered what would happen to crypto wallet after you die ? Want to leave a message to world the day you pass away ? I would love to get your feedback on the idea, the design and the user experience :-) Most of the actions are work in progress though.
previous.title: Wayt - Don't leave without saying goodbye

localize.description: 有没有想过，你死后，加密钱包会发生什么？想在你去世的那一天给世界留下一句话吗？我很想得到你对这个想法、设计和用户体验的反馈：-) 不过大部分的操作都在进行中。
有沒有想過，你死後，加密錢包會發生什麼？想在你去世的那一天給世界留下一句話嗎？我很想得到你對這個想法、設計和用戶體驗的反饋：-) 不過大部分的操作都在進行中。

next.title:
This summer’s overpriced hotels, flights and Airbnb’s will be brought to you by Johnson & Johnson, Pfizer and Moderna

(I cannot wait to overpay for a vacation)

localize.full_text:
今年夏天的天价酒店、机票和Airbnb将由强生公司（Johnson & Johnson）、辉瑞公司（Pfizer）和摩德纳公司（Moderna）为您带来。

(我迫不及待地想多付点钱去度假)

今年夏天的天價酒店、機票和Airbnb將由強生公司（Johnson & Johnson）、輝瑞公司（Pfizer）和摩德納公司（Moderna）爲您帶來。

(我迫不及待地想多付點錢去度假)
